info.name: parse_mr_files
info.description: It parses all mr files and generates the graph tag and content of the xml files.

input.name: xml_files
input.description: It is provided all the xml files of the source_path directory and its subdirectories.

input.name: mr_files
input.description: It is provided all the mr files of the source_path directory and its subdirectories.

output.name: xml_files
output.description: It returns all xml files with the graph tag when appropriate.
